weekly picks (Aug 2 week 2023)

Posted on August 7, 2023 in 2023aug,  Daily t.me,  adsabs,  g scholar

A WordCloud of 2023 Aug 2nd week collection

  1. 2308.04427 Pb_(10-x)Cu_x(PO_4)_6O: a Mott or charge transfer insulator in need of further doping for (super)conductivity (LK99, arXiv)

  2. 2308.04344 Structural, electronic, magnetic properties of Cu-doped lead-apatite Pb$_{10-x}$Cu$_x$(PO$_4$)$_6$O (LK99, arXiv)

  3. 2308.04301 Electronic correlations in promising room-temperature superconductor Pb$_9$Cu(PO$_4$)$_6$O: a DFT+DMFT study (LK99, arXiv)

  4. 2308.03948 High Temperature Superconductivity with Strong Correlations and Disorder: Possible Relevance to Cu-doped Apatite (LK99, arXiv)

  5. 2308.03836 Edge states of 2D time-reversal-invariant topological superconductors with strong interactions and disorder: A view from the lattice (arXiv)

  6. 2308.03835 Emergence of nodal Bogoliubov quasiparticles across the transition from the pseudogap metal to the d-wave superconductor (arXiv)

  7. 2308.04128 Optical Manipulation of the Charge Density Wave state in RbV3Sb5 (arXiv)

  8. 2308.03895 Chirality manipulation of ultrafast phase switchings in a correlated CDW-Weyl semimetal (arXiv)

  9. 2308.03899 Charge Polarization around Impurities in Strained Graphene (Strained Graphene, arXiv)

  10. 2308.03993 Perpendicular electronic transport and moire-induced resonance in twisted interfaces of 3D graphite (arXiv)

  11. PhysRevLett.131.061601 All-Order Coulomb Corrections to Delbruck Scattering above the Pair-Production Threshold (PRL)

  12. 2308.03544 Absence of superconductivity in LK-99 at ambient conditions (LK99, arXiv)

  13. 2308.03454 Metallization and Spin Fluctuations in Cu-doped Lead Apatite (LK99, arXiv)

  14. 2308.03218 The Cu induced ultraflat band in the room-temperature superconductor Pb$_{10-x}$Cu$_x$(PO$_4$)$_6$O$_4$ ($x=0,0.5$) (LK99 CJia,arXiv)

  15. 2308.03110 Ferromagnetic half levitation of LK-99-like synthetic samples (LK99 half levitation, arXiv)

  16. 2308.02547 $d$-mon: transmon with strong anharmonicity (arXiv)

  17. 2308.03691 Possible ferroic properties of copper-substituted lead phosphate apatite (LK99 symmetry, arXiv)

  18. 2308.03751 Tight-binding models for SG 143 (P3) and application to recent DFT results on copper-doped lead apatite (LK99 TB, arXiv)

  19. 2308.03681 Analytic density of states of two-dimensional Chern insulator (arXiv)

  20. 2308.03309 Exciton-spin interactions in antiferromagnetic charge-transfer insulators (arXiv)

  21. 2308.03168 Breakdown of Chiral Edge Modes in Topological Magnon Insulators (arXiv)

  22. 2308.03143 Magic Angles and Fractional Chern Insulators in Twisted Homobilayer TMDs (arXiv)

  23. 2308.03074 Non-Fermi Liquid Behavior of the $t$-$J$ Model in the Strange Metal Phase: $U(1)$ Gauge Theory with Local Constraints (arXiv)

  24. 2308.02657 Observation of Fractionally Quantized Anomalous Hall Effect (arXiv)

  25. 2308.03551 Quasicrystalline Nanocrystal Superlattice with Partial Matching Rules (arXiv)

  26. 2308.03054 Spatially correlated classical and quantum noise in driven qubits: The good, the bad, and the ugly (DLoss, arXiv)

  27. PhysRevX.13.031015 Observation of First-Order Quantum Phase Transitions and Ferromagnetism in Twisted Double Bilayer Graphene (PRX)

  28. PhysRevLett.131.066401 Coherent-Phonon-Driven Intervalley Scattering and Rabi Oscillation in Multivalley 2D Materials (PRL)

  29. 2308.02475 Lifshitz transition enabling superconducting dome around the quantum critical point in TiSe$_2$ (arXiv)

  30. 2308.02469 S-wave pairing in a two-orbital t-J model on triangular lattice: possible application to Pb$_{10-x}$Cu$_x$(PO$_4$)$_6$O (Hanbit YHZhang LK99 model, arXiv)

  31. 2308.01932 Investigation on Machine Learning Based Approaches for Estimating the Critical Temperature of Superconductors (arXiv)

  32. 2308.01943 Beyond Kitaev physics in strong spin-orbit coupled magnets (arXiv)

  33. 2308.01997 The correlated insulators of magic angle twisted bilayer graphene at zero and one quantum of magnetic flux: a tight-binding study (arXiv)

  34. 2308.02406 Coherent spin qubit shuttling through germanium quantum dots (arXiv)

  35. 2308.02336 Anisotropy of the spin Hall effect in a Dirac ferromagnet (arXiv)

  36. 2308.02130 Spin-valley locking in Kekul\‘e-distorted graphene with Dirac-Rashba interactions (arXiv)

  37. 2308.02372 Strongly Anisotropic Spin and Orbital Rashba Effect at a Tellurium - Noble Metal Interface (orbital Rashba, arXiv)

  38. 2308.02189 Spin pumping effect in non-Fermi liquid metals (arXiv)
